name: vscode-md-mermaid
description: Adds Mermaid diagram and flowchart support to VS Code's builtin markdown preview

markdown-mermaid.lightModeTheme.description: Default Mermaid theme for light mode.

markdown-mermaid.darkModeTheme.description: Default Mermaid theme for dark mode.

markdown-mermaid.maxTextSize.description: The maximum allowed size of the users text diagram.

markdown-mermaid.mouseNavigation.enabled.description: Controls when mouse-based navigation (panning and zooming) is enabled on mermaid diagrams.
markdownEnumDescriptions: Always enable mouse navigation on mermaid diagrams
Only enable mouse navigation when holding down `alt` (`option` on mac). Gestures such as pinch-to-zoom will still work without `alt`.

markdown-mermaid.controls.show.description: Enables/disables showing UI controls on mermaid diagrams.
enumDescriptions: Show zoom controls when hovering over or focusing on a diagram

markdown-mermaid.resizable.description: Allow diagrams to be resized vertically by dragging the bottom edge.

markdown-mermaid.maxHeight.markdownDescription: Maximum height for diagrams. Can be a number (pixels) or a CSS value like `80vh` or `400px`. Leave empty to try to automatically size diagrams based on their content.

scripts.version:patch: node -e "const pkg=require('./package.json'); const v=pkg.version.split('.'); v[2]=parseInt(v[2])+1; pkg.version=v.join('.'); require('fs').writeFileSync('./package.json', JSON.stringify(pkg,null,2)+'\n'); console.log('Version updated to '+pkg.version)"
scripts.release: bun run version:patch && bun run build && mkdir -p dist/vsix && vsce package --no-dependencies -o dist/vsix && code --install-extension dist/vsix/vscode-md-mermaid-*.vsix --force
